thread.title: Prepare to pay more, LPG cylinder prices rise in UAE
thread.title_full: Prepare to pay more, LPG cylinder prices rise in UAE

title: Prepare to pay more, LPG cylinder prices rise in UAE
text:
Prepare to pay more, LPG cylinder prices rise in UAE Web Team /Dubai   Share More > Vote 
Workers of the Lahej and Sultan Gas Distributors unloading the cylinders from a van in Karama in Dubai. (File photo) The international price for LPG has gone up substantially in the last two months. The Emirates General Petroleum Corporation, Emarat, has announced a rise in prices for liquefied petroleum gas, LPG, cylinders effective from February 10, 2017. In a statement, the corporation said "The international price for LPG has gone up substantially in the last two months, hence we are constrained to make a revision in the sale price of cylinders". Effective today, the following prices will be applicable: Cylinder capacity (Kg)
